item.title: Plz help me lol
item.dc:creator: @baddy351 baddy351
item.description:
@baddy351 wrote:

[quote=“purestmage74, post:4, topic:409829”][quote author=sandboxpvp link=topic=511102.msg3708825#msg3708825 date=1313208168]
i dont know what the percent for the drop of this item is. it is dragon claws

14484:1

if anyone can tell me that would be great
[/quote]

NPC Used In Example: KBD
NPC ID: 50

One Example Dropping at a 45% rate.
And Dropping the item id 555, in amounts of 150 each time.

50 = npc id || 45 = rate % .
555 = Item Id || 150 = Amount.[/quote]

Rep++

Read full topic

555 = Item Id || 150 = Amount.
